name: gimme a brake
description:
2.5d racing game made for a Game Off Jam 2022.

Inspired by Outrun that I used to play as a kid on arcade machines and Horizon Chase Turbo that I played recently.

The idea of making a 2.5d game came after reading a Wolfenstein 3d Game Engine Black Book that I highly recommend.

The source code is open and available on GitHub.
Written from scratch in TypeScript utilizing HTML canvas.
You can play the latest version on GitHub pages here: Play 

Kudos to TSYD for writing music and sounds.
